document.heading: DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA ELECTION CODE OF 1955 AMENDMENT ACT OF 1991, BILL 9-191

history.narrative: Law 9-32 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 9-191, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 4, 1991, and June 18, 1991, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 2, 1991, it was assigned Act No. 9-59 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
